attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The game" is an on going and trully infuriating mind game, the origins of which are varied.

In short, to know of the game, means that you are playing the game, and the longer you can forget that you are playing the game, thhe longer you are winning the game, but the moment you remember that you are playing the game, you lose the game, and have to announce it to every one around you by saying out loud, "I have just lost the game"

This game, fun though it is, is getting beyond the joke. However, there is a way to end this madness. All that is needed is for a single world leader to announce that, 

"The Game is UP!"

In a public interview or press conference. That is all we ask, four simple words, no changes in policy, and something that wont cost the tax payer a single penny, yet will bring succour to millions around the world!

With our regards,
The Undersigned

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
